thing-type.label: ZSE18 Motion & Vibration Sensor
thing-type.description: Motion &amp; Vibration Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtMotion detection, built-in vibration sensor, S2 security protocol and AES-128 signal encryption, 2 alternative power sources: 1 CR123A battery or micro USB, auto-inclusion for instant set-up, visual range test tool, magnetic mount, adjustable LED indicator, low battery alerts, Z-Wave Plus </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtFor USB power, in stay awake mode, press and hold the button. <strong&gtNOTE</strong&gt: The device will continue in stay awake mode even if later moved to battery power.</li&gt <li&gtPress and release the Z-Wave button 3 times quickly for battery mode. </li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and release the Z-Wave button on the sensor 3 times as quickly as possible.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and release the Z-Wave button on the sensor 3 times as quickly as possible.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: BASIC SET reports
parameter.description: 0 - disabled, 1 - enabled<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtto enable or disable BASIC SET reports when motion is triggered for Group 2 of associated devices. </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: reverse BASIC SET
parameter.description: 0: 255 motion, 0 timeout. 1: 0 motion, 255 timeout<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt Use it to reverse values sent in BASIC SET reports when motion is triggered for Group 2 of associated devices. </p&gt <p&gt0 - BASIC SET sends 255 when motion is triggered, BASIC SET sends 0 when motion times out </p&gt <p&gt1 - BASIC SET sends 0 when motion is triggered, BASIC SET sends 255 when motion times out. </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_18_2
parameter.label: 18: trigger interval
parameter.description: 3=6 seconds, 65535=65538 seconds (add 3 seconds to value set)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtset trigger interval - the time when motion is reported again after initial trigger. </p&gt <p&gtNOTE: Small interval will increase activity and decrease battery life.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_20_1
parameter.label: 20: LED Indicator
parameter.description: 0=disabled, 1=enabled (default)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtto disable the LED indicator</p&gt <p&gtOR CLICK internal button 6 TIMES TO DISABLE / ENABLE LED</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_32_1
parameter.label: 32: Low Battery Alert
parameter.description: percent battery left<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtbattery level for low battery reports</p&gt</p&gt
